entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
